pause_reason: Pivoting to higher-priority EXP_TEMPORAL_FIDELITY_001. POD feasibility confirmed but implementation complexity is high. Temporal fidelity is simpler and more likely to succeed.

feasibility_check.conclusion: POD CAN capture temperature fields, but coefficient mapping is complex. Implementation would require either solving reduced systems or learning a mapping.

decision_point: W0 added EXP_TEMPORAL_FIDELITY_001 (priority 1) which is simpler and more promising. Should pivot?
